content:
I don't have personal preferences, but there are many other delicious dishes from caribbean cuisine. here are a few more popular ones:

1. jerk chicken - a spicy and flavorful jamaican dish where chicken is marinated in a blend of spices and grilled over charcoal or wood. 2. arroz con pollo - a puerto rican dish that translates to "rice with chicken," made with yellow rice, chicken, and sofrito (a mixture of onions, peppers, and garlic). 3. callaloo - a popular trinidadian soup made with leafy greens, okra, coconut milk, and spices. 4. cubano sandwich - a cuban sandwich made with cuban bread, roast pork, ham, swiss cheese, pickles, and mustard. 5. tostones - fried plantains, a popular side dish in many caribbean countries. these dishes are just a few examples, and there are many more delicious dishes to explore in caribbean cuisine.
